text: @DonaldJTrumpJr You are a mutha fucking liar. 80k plus is saving lives. Y’all can’t even keep the fucking @WhiteHouse clean from the coronavirus. I can’t wait for November so @JoeBiden can get y’all the fuck outta here. Stop bragging about doing nothing absolutely nothing. Sorry ass Bastard
